question.query: what assets are being discussed on twitter

agentResult.finalAnswer:
Discussion on Twitter is currently dominated by massive shifts in **stablecoin liquidity**, the explosive growth of **prediction markets**, and new high-performance infrastructure benchmarks. **USDC** and **USDT** are seeing unprecedented attention following reports that total stablecoin transaction volume hit a record **$33 trillion** in 2025. This 72% year-over-year increase is being framed as a structural validation of onchain settlement, with **USDC** leading the charge at $18.3 trillion in volume. 

https://res.cloudinary.com/dgjriemfd/image/upload/v1767981032/veldt/agbovec1cnnux2kkdril.jpg

### Prediction Markets & AI Infrastructure
**Polymarket** and **Kalshi** are trending after a record-breaking weekend driven by NFL Playoffs trading. **Kalshi** posted an all-time high of **$837.1M** in weekend volume, while **Polymarket** integrated real-time prediction data with **Dow Jones** and **The Wall Street Journal**. Simultaneously, **AI infrastructure** is seeing renewed interest as Epoch AI data circulates, showing that global AI compute is doubling every 7 months. This has kept **Nvidia** and its onchain proxies like **NVIDIA rStock (NVDAr)** at the center of the "Physical AI" narrative.

344856

### Onchain Rotations & Narrative Drivers
**Hyperliquid (HYPE)** continues to suck liquidity out of major L2s, recording **$246.3M** in net inflows over the past week while **Arbitrum** saw outflows exceeding $200M. The launch of the **US500** market and the growth of HIP-3 DEXs like **trade.xyz** have pushed **Hyperliquid** to the top of the fee-generation leaderboard at $1.7M. **Celestia (TIA)** is also gaining significant mindshare after announcing **Fibre**, a new data availability layer claiming **1 Tb/s** throughput to support "every market" from AI to micro-payments.

https://res.cloudinary.com/dgjriemfd/image/upload/v1768326493/veldt/zttsqeqirmgyunq6q5rf.jpg

In the mid-cap and altcoin sectors, **MetaDAO (META)** and **Pyth Network (PYTH)** are seeing spikes in mentions due to governance updates and new institutional integrations. **Pyth** specifically is benefiting from a new **PYTH Reserve** mechanism that channels protocol revenue into treasury buybacks. Meanwhile, **Silver** and **Gold** are trending in macro circles as both hit historic highs, fueling a "risk-on" sentiment that has helped **Bitcoin** reclaim the $90,000 level despite neutral retail sentiment.

347555
